# isPhonetic

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that specifies whether the receiver should use only the phonetic representations of name components.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPhonetic: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Configuring Formatter Behavior

- **style**: The formatting style of the receiver.

items.description: The formatting style of the receiver.
